## Metadata

- Operating system: Ubuntu
- Ruby version: latest
- Node version: latest
- `@prettier/plugin-ruby` or `prettier` gem version: latest
- Options:

  - `rubyHashLabel` - `true`
  - `rubyModifier` - `true`
  - `rubySingleQuote` - `true`
  - `rubyToProc` - `false`
  - `trailingComma` - `"none"`
